doc:
Lawson Harris https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lawson_Harris 0 William Lawson Harris (June 30, 1897 – March 31, 1948) was an American director, actor, producer, and writer who made a number of films in Australia. He came to Australia originally at the behest of Arthur Shirley to work as production manager on The Throwback (1920) and stayed out there for a number of years. Harris was the father of actor and director John Derek. William_Lawson_Harris ( June_30_,_1897 – March_31_,_1948 ) was an_American_director , actor , producer , and writer who made a_number of films in Australia . He came to Australia originally at the_behest of Arthur_Shirley to_work as production_manager on The_Throwback_(_1920_) and stayed out there for a_number of years . Harris was the_father of actor_and_director_John_Derek .
